_sText:
Tier 2 bhop map

The bonus is 3 maps made by Valve for Half Life 1 in the GoldSrc engine. I ported the maps over to the source engine and edited them for bhop.

Map list for bonus.
c1a1c.bsp (stage1)
c2a5.bsp (stage2)
c2a5g.bsp (stage3)

TF2 version: https://gamebanana.com/maps/201000
CSGO version: https://gamebanana.com/maps/201711
